channel.title: weather on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in weather on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lovely day
item.description: 14:03 Thursday 25 January 2018 JST Great online Integration Group today. Just six men in the call (we recently have had as many as 11 or 12). I was asked to facilitate twice (joy for me) and both men said it was very helpful. yay! Headed to work now, slightly later than my arrive-early target, but still early enough to be on time. The weather is clear blue chilly with snow melting in the sun and frozen solid in the shade.

item.title: rain wow
item.description: 01:22 Saturday 15 October 2016 AWST Super interesting rain here. It’s “partly cloudy” but with each cloud there’s like a decent rain shower. Then clear for 20 minutes and then rain like boom and then clear and then rain. It’s been happening basically all day. We never got storms like that in Houston, where it’s like boooooom rain and then clear for the rest of the week or month.

item.title: Warm storm
item.description: 09:35 Friday 11 December 2015 JST Lin and I slept late, wrapped up in blankets, trying to fend off the cold weather. She remembered that it’s trash day and upon opening the door to check if it had been collected, discovered the storm wind is relatively warm! I guess it’s a typhoon, though I haven’t been watching the weather / news at all.
